name: Dog Racing Challenge 3D 2017
description:
Dog Racing Challenge 3D 2017 is most exciting and adventurous game with ultra-realistic graphics.You will find your dog speedy at challenging phase when you will collect more coins. Test your skills by weaving through challenging hurdles in simulator of a dog race mission.

During race make your dog run carefully to overcome obstacles during way. If you collide with any obstacle then your mission is failed. It provides you to thrilling environment and amazing 3D graphics in this exciting dog race. By earning coins and you are supposed to unlock the other dogs.

Do not forget to pick up coins to make your game play more interesting!

Dare to achieve the endless dog racing challenge by achieving high score simply install it as, Fun is guaranteed!

How to play:
• Tap to play
• Tilt control
• Start the race with unlocked dog
• Overcome hurdles by jumping and tilting
• Collect as much collectables or coins as you could for high score

Features:
• Smooth Tilt control
• Free to play
• Amazing 3D graphics
• Easy to control
